Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28863 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28863 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 20.14.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-28863
